### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Resorts (
    resort_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    resort_name VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_schedule TEXT,
    equipment_inventory JSON
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Resorts SET maintenance_schedule = 'Monthly' WHERE resort_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Resorts (
    resort_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    resort_name VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_schedule TEXT,
    equipment_inventory JSON
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Resorts SET maintenance_schedule = 'Monthly', equipment_inventory = '{"skis": 40, "snowboards": 25}' WHERE resort_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Resorts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    num_rooms INT,
    manager VARCHAR(255)
);


CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedules (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    resort_id UUID REFERENCES Resorts (id),
    equipment_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician VARCHAR(255)
);


CREATE TABLE EquipmentInventory (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    resort_id UUID REFERENCES Resorts (id),
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT,
    condition VARCHAR(255)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Resorts SET num_rooms = 100 WHERE location = 'Mountain Resort';

);

);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE MaintenanceSchedules SET technician = 'John Doe' WHERE equipment_type = 'HVAC' AND maintenance_date = '2022-08-15';
